allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve TypeScript error in About.tsx GSAP animation

- Change fallback values from string "50%" to numeric calculations
- Use window.innerHeight/2 and window.innerWidth/2 for fallback positioning
- Fixes Vercel build error for type compatibility with GSAP TweenValue

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve TypeScript error in ThreeBackground bufferAttribute

- Use args prop format [positions, 3] instead of separate count/array/itemSize
- Fixes React Three Fiber type compatibility issue

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add Vercel configuration for frontend subdirectory

- Configure buildCommand, installCommand, and outputDirectory
- Point Vercel to frontend folder for Next.js build
- Fixes 404 deployment issue

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF'' fix: resolve hydration error in Footer component - Change

to

to properly contain child div elements - Fixes React hydration error for invalid HTML nesting - Add proper company description text Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code) Co-Authored-By: Claude EOF )")
